name: slush
content:
slush noun
(SNOW)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] snow that is lying on the ground and has started to melt
[ C or U ] mainly US a thick drink made from crushed ice and a sweet liquid: a cherry/cola slush

(ROMANTIC LANGUAGE)
